name: Dead²
description:
Dead Squared is a game in which you must die in order to finish the game. The game features 3 chapters each with unique mechanics and a unique theme - Neon, Snow & Rainbow. The game is slow paced and peaceful however beating the game's 15 levels isn't easy. Enjoy.

Vote for the Winner Here: https://www.poll-maker.com/poll982282x52De4B5c-41

CONTROLS:

A - Left

D - Right

Space - Jump

K - Restart

M - Main Menu

DISCORD: dombrett

SOLO
